resources.string: We feel honored to introduce to you and invite you for the 2019 International Conference on Data Science and Communication (IconDSC) in association with IEEE, IEEE Communication Society (Bangalore Section), Computer Society of India (Division–IV) and Kyungpook National University, scheduled on 1–2 March 2019 at Faculty of Engineering, CHRIST (Deemed to be University), Bangalore, India.

2019 International Conference on Data Science and Communication (IconDSC) solicit papers in the areas of Internet of Things, Data Science, Network and Security, Software Engineering, Signal Processing, Communication, Embedded Systems, Electrical Systems, Smart Grids and Internet of Energy (loE), Sustainable Energy Systems and all the relevant disciplines to a common forum. Original, unpublished research papers highlighting specific research domains from all viewpoints are invited from delegates all over the globe.

The IconDSC envisions its role towards enhancement of research in the area of data science and communication through collaboration, innovative methodologies and connections throughout the globe. In this direction, the mission is to deliver and coordinate, enact and publicize research and resources that enhance the impact and growth of education pertaining to the theme of the conference. The primary goal of the conference is to promote research and developmental, promote scientific information interchange between researchers, developers, engineers, students, and practitioners working in India and abroad.
Press back one more time to exit

If this is your first time using the app, please sign up with your email address. Should you choose to create an account, you are agreeing to the usage of your data as noted in our privacy policy. Please click on this card to know more.
Please enter the email address with which you registered with us. The password reset link will be sent to you via email.

The IconDSC app allows you to enjoy a smooth experience throughout the course of the programme. We hope that you will have a pleasant experience with us, and look forward to your feedback and suggestions during the course of the event.

To know more about each of the paper presentation sessions, you can click on them in the schedule given below. You can click on any of the venue names to receive directions via Google Maps.
We would love to have your honest feedback on the entire programme. Please fill the form below. You can change your feedback at any time during the event.
1. Please rate your overall satisfaction with the conference.
2. Please rate your overall satisfaction with the reviewing of papers.
3. Please rate your overall satisfaction with the panel sessions.
4. Please rate your overall satisfaction with the keynote speakers.
5. Please rate your overall satisfaction with the registration, reception and hospitality.
6. Please rate your overall satisfaction with the facilities.
7. Please rate your overall satisfaction with the schedule of the conference.
8. Which elements of the event did you like most?
9. What, if anything, did you dislike about this event?
10. Is there anything we could have done to make your event experience easier or more convenient?
Feedback already submitted. Making an edit?
We hope to see you again soon! If you are leaving because of any technical difficulties with the application, please do not hesitate to let us know.
